thread.title: Equify, LLC Announces Appointment of Michael Grimm as President, Auctions

author: cnbc.com
title: Equify, LLC Announces Appointment of Michael Grimm as President, Auctions
text:
Seasoned Executive Joins Equify Team to Execute Strategic Growth Initiatives
FORT WORTH, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Equify Auctions, LLC, a division of Equify, LLC, an asset-based lending and heavy equipment auction company, today announced Michael Grimm has been named President, effective March 12, 2018.
As President of Equify Auctions, Mr. Grimm will be responsible for global growth initiatives and operational functions worldwide. Mr. Grimm will report directly to Executive Officer, Justin Wilks.
“We’re thrilled to have Mike on board as our new President of Equify Auctions as a part of the continuation of our company’s global expansion strategy,” said Justin Wilks, Equify’s Executive Officer. “Throughout his career, Mike has proven to be a sound leader with an extensive understanding of the heavy equipment industry. We are confident that his ability to thrive in a variety of business environments will further the growth our company is experiencing and advance the expansion of our global auction capabilities.”
Mr. Grimm most recently served as Vice President of Sales at HOLT CAT. In his role, Mr. Grimm was responsible for leading, growing, and developing a team of sales professionals to achieve financial targets and improve customer service. Prior to joining HOLT CAT in 2007, Mr. Grimm served in several leadership positions at Caterpillar, Inc., culminating in his final role there as Six Sigma Black Belt focusing on operational and process improvement. Mr. Grimm received a Bachelor’s degree in Advertising and Spanish from Southern Methodist University.
About Equify, LLC: Equify has identified 5 basic principles that directly impact the overall success of a business, centered around financing, commercial insurance and risk management, heavy equipment and machinery, asset management and interim construction lending. To make the process easier they developed the Healthy Business Checklist which, by answering just a few questions, provides business owners with immediate exposure to areas in their operation that may need help. Visit healthybusinesschecklist.com for more information. To find out more about the other services Equify offers, visit equifyllc.com .
